metadata.title: CVE-2017-17789 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
In GIMP 2.8.22, there is a heap-based buffer overflow in read_channel_datain plug-ins/common/file-psp.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-17789` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gimp - 2.8.22-1
gimp-data - 2.8.22-1
libgimp2.0 - 2.8.22-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gimp package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.22-1').
